It's now J time! #murderdrones #Jmurderdrones #sight #sights #alltanks

~HISTORICAL SIGHTS FOR WW1 VEHICLES~
An installation guide is provided in the file

This is a part of this pack --> https://live.warthunder.com/post/1111735/en/

Realistic sights for all WW1 vehicles in the event. Since these sights were primarily designed for aiming in the enemy’s general direction, they featured a simple cross reticle. The only exception is the Garford-Putilov, which utilized a German artillery reticle.

Pro tip: Set up sight distance control keybinds and use the rangefinder to hit targets more easily.

==========================================

We are evaluating it. Like it. Download it!
I hope you enjoy it, my dear comrades!

~Alt-History Sight For Leopard A1A1~

I like using vanilla historical Leo's sight but found it clustered so I removed a bunch of lines and went to battle and was like "Where TF is my crosshair?" So I added a bunch of range lines and was like "This look suck." So I made them radial and realized that it's basically WW2 sight so I made it exactly like Tiger II's sight. I went to battle again and realize that it still sucks so I tweaked the crosshair and was like "What if I make TNO Leopard sight?" and added random stuffs that I think the Wehrmacht might cook up.

Btw the mils on the cr...

#Копатыч #Kopatych #Долой_Пошлятину_в_сообшестве! #Сообществу_нужны_нормальные_прицелы! #crosshair #crosshairs #прицел #прицелы

Как добавить прицел в War Thunder?
1)Заходите в папку War Thunder и там ищите папку UserSights если ее нету то надо ее создать.
2)Далее распаковывайте .zip файл и вставляете этот файл в папку UserSights
3)Заходим в War Thunder
4)Переходим в: Настройки; Танковые настроки; Настройки прицела
5)Далее ищем нужную нам прицельную сетку.
Всем удачи!😉
#Долой_Пошлятину_в_сообшестве! #Сообществу_нужны_нормальные_прицелы! #crosshair #crosshairs #прицел #прицелы
